summary.para: Represents an omnidirectional model for an . The omnidirectional emission is interpolated linearly with the directivity model specified in the Type field based on the value of the Scaling field.
The type of shape in which sound is emitted by an .

The amount of linear interpolation applied between omnidirectional sound and the directivity specified in the Type field. This is a normalized value between 0 and 1.0 where 0 is omnidirectional and 1.0 is full directivity using the specified type.
